meta_info.title: New Ithkuil Dictionary (ITH-ENG)
meta_info.full_title: New Ithkuil Lexical Roots, Affixes, and Morphemes (Ithkuil-English)
meta_info.description: A compilation of New Ithkuil Lexical Roots, Affixes, and Morphemes that have been created by John Q.

abbr_def.abbr_v: A bivalent zero-to-one gradient. Degree 1 signifies one extreme of a gradient spectrum/range of meaning (whether minimal or maximal) while Degree 9 signifies the other extreme (whether minimal or maximal). Degrees 2 through 8 cumulatively add (or subtract) an amount of the concept associated with the affix.
A bivalent “zero-to-one” spectrum-like gradient like Type A1 where Degrees 1 and 9 convey sufficiency connotations of “too little X” and “too much X”.

A “three-by-three” gradient pattern. Degrees 1 through 3 signify a spectrum or range involving one sub-parameter, Degrees 4 through 6 signify the same spectrum/range under a different sub-parameter, and Degrees 7 through 9 signify the same spectrum/range under a third sub-parameter.

A “one-by-two” or “oscillating” gradient. Degree 1 represents one extreme of a spectrum/range which increases/decreases to the other extreme of the spectrum/range usually represented by Degree 4, while Degrees 6 through 9 cycle back through the same values but with a different sub-parameter operating orthogonally to Degrees 1 through 4. Degree 5 usually represents a neutral or meta-level value associated with the semantic concept of the affix.

A trivalent “-1 to 0 to +1” gradient. Degrees 1 and 9 represent opposite (or complementary) extremes of a spectrum/range while Degree 5 (sometimes Degree 4 or 6) represents a “mid-point” signifying a standard, normal, commonplace, neutral, zero, or baseline value.

A trivalent “-1 to 0 to +1” gradient like Type D1 where Degrees 1 and 9 convey sufficiency connotations of “too little X” and “too much X”, where the operating sufficiency parameter is excessivesness (or the lack thereof).

deftext.kref: ROOTS ASSOCIATED WITH ITHKUIL GRAMMATICAL FUNCTIONS

ar.k: ROOTS ASSOCIATED WITH ITHKUIL GRAMMATICAL FUNCTIONS

def.gr: Acts/Processes Accomplished by Means of Tools/Implements

def.deftext: -TKF- MECHANICAL JOINT/PIVOT POINT FOR KINEMATIC PAIR
-LTKF- MECHANICAL JOINT/PIVOT POINT FOR KINEMATIC PAIR
-MSY- ENERGY OUTPUT DIFFERENTIAL OR REDIRECTION VIA GEAR MECHANISM
-RKS- SPLIT IN HALF/DIVIDE INTO PARTS/SPLIT OFF A PIECE
-LXR- ROLL/WHEELED TRANSLATIVE MOTION/WIND UP OR AROUND
-ŇVR- FACIAL MAKE-UP/BODY PAINT/BODY MAKE-UP/SPRAY-ON TAN SOLUTION

def.gr: Tools and Implements/Materials/Substances Used To Maintain Completed States Created via Tools/Devices/Machines/Manual Processes

def.deftext: -XBL- LIQUID AS RESOURCE CONSUMED IN A PROCESS 1
-XBR- LIQUID AS RESOURCE CONSUMED IN A PROCESS 2
-ZXL- CONCRETE CHISEL/COLD CHISEL/OTHER SPECIALIZED HAMMER- OR POWER-DRIVEN CHISEL
-KŠVY- ALLEN WRENCH/HEX WRENCH/LUG WRENCH/OTHER NON-ADJUSTABLE WRENCH
-ŽBL- TWIST DRILL BIT/BRAD-POINT DRILL BIT/AUGER DRILL BIT
-ŽBR- SELF-FEED DRILL BIT/SPADE DRILL BIT/PADDLE DRILL BIT/FORSTNER DRILL BIT
-ŽBY- STEP DRILL BIT/TILE DRILL BIT/OTHER SPECIALTY DRILL BIT

def.gr: Objects/Implements Used to Hold/Contain Foodstuffs During Preparation, Cooking, and Serving

def.deftext: -SBŘ- PIE TIN/BAKING DISH/BAKING MOLD/OTHER METALLIC OR CERAMIC BAKING DISH/CONTAINER/PLATFORM

def.gr: Fixtures Used To Facilitate/Maintain States Created via Tools/Devices/Machines/Manual Processes/Powered Processes

def.deftext: -RVB- POWER SYSTEM PROTECTION UNIT (E.G., FUSEBOX / CIRCUIT BREAKER BOX)
-DL- VERTICAL-PLANAR RANGE OF MOTION (RANDOM MOTION WITHIN)
-FL- MOTION IN A PLANAR CIRCULAR PATH
-TL- GENERIC/OBLIQUE 3-DIMENSIONAL RANGE OF MOTION, I.E., 3D PERVASIVE MOVEMENT THROUGHOUT OR WITHIN A VOLUME OF SPACE

def.gr: Positionally-Defined Componential Parts Of A Whole

def.deftext: -ẒL- MEDIAN PLANAR MIDDLE (SPLITTING LARGEST CROSS SECTION LEFT+RIGHT)
-ẒR- FRONTAL PLANAR MIDDLE (SPLITTING LARGEST CROSS SECTION FRONT+BACK)
-ẒW- TRANSVERSE PLANAR MIDDLE (SPLITTING LARGEST CROSS SECTION TOP+BOTTOM)

def.gr: Additional Roots Related to Spatio-Temporal Motion

def.deftext: -ẒKY- MODULATION OF ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVE FOR COMMUNICATION PURPOSES
-ẒDY- CRIMINAL WARRANT/SEIZURE OF EVIDENCE/DETENTION OF SUSPECT/ARREST OF SUSPECT
-KŠK- FANTASTIC OR IMAGINARY BEING OR CREATURE/MONSTER
-RSMR- INVISIBILITY/APPORTATION/ABILITY TO PASS THROUGH SOLID OBJECTS
-LTM- SOCIAL INTERACTION/SOCIETAL NORM/SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY/MEMBER OF SOCIETY
-ĻGW- GRANTING OF EXCUSE/PARDON⬌REQUESTING TO BE EXCUSED/PARDONED
-CPĻ- SOUND MADE BY OR WITH PART OF ONE'S BODY

def.gr: General Sound Parameters and Reaction To Sound

def.deftext: -ÇKÇ- WILLOW FLUTE/SALLOW FLUTE/TIN WHISTLE/PENNY WHISTLE/SIDE WHISTLE/PISTON FLUTE/SWANEE
-LÇKH- SRALAI/PI NAI/SOUTHEAST ASIAN QUADRUPLE REED INSTRUMENT
-NÇKŢ- NABAL/KAKAKI/OTHER STRAIGHT AND LONE VALVELESS HORN
-SF- SENSE OF TASTE/THE TASTE OF SOMETHING

def.gr: Affective Sensory States (i.e., Proprioceptive, Interoceptive, and Vestibular-Sensory States)

def.deftext: -FTŘ- ABNORMAL AFFECTIVE TACTILE SENSATION ON SKIN
-NZF- RELIEF/TRIUMPH FROM GETTING AWAY FROM UNDESIRED EVENTS
-CTY- JUGGLING PIN OR BALL/BATON/OTHER HAND-HELD RECREATIVE IMPLEMENT
-ŽDŘ- OTHER INFORMAL THROWING OR TARGET-BASED GAME
-LTKÇ- DODGEBALL-/KICKBALL-LIKE GAME/OTHER BALL-THROWING, BALL-HITTING, BALL-KICKING OR BALL-CATCHING GAME
-PSŢŘ- NON-CONTACT TAG-BASED VERSION OF CONTACT SPORT/KABADDI/JUGGER

def.gr: The Quality Or Property Of Matter

def.deftext: -RTKL- LESS TYPICAL PHYSICAL STATE OF MATTER
-RKK- MEASURE OF SPREAD RATE BY VOLUME (JGV/JGY)
-RKKR- MEASURE OF RATE OF ABSORBED DOSE OF IONIZING RADIATION (LPSW/(LPS/STR))
-NKKY- MEASURE OF RADIANT EXPOSURE/ENERGY DISTRIBUTION/INSOLATION/SOLAR IRRADIATION (LPSW/JGY)
-NKF- MEASURE OF SPECTRAL FLUX BY FREQUENCY (LPSF/STR)
-NKFW- MEASURE OF SPECTRAL FLUX BY WAVELENGTH
-NKFY- MEASURE OF HEAT FLUX DENSITY/IRRADIANCE/RADIANT EXITANCE/RADIOSITY
-NKFL- MEASURE OF SPECTRAL EXITANCE/RADIOSITY/IRRADIANCE BY FREQUENCY
-NKFR- MEASURE OF SPECTRAL EXITANCE/RADIOSITY/IRRADIANCE BY WAVELENGTH
-NKFF- MEASURE OF SPECTRAL RADIENCE BY FREQUENCY
-PŢKL- MEASURE OF SPECIFIC HEAT CAPACITY/SPECIFIC ENTROPY
-ŇŠPY- MEASURE OF ELECTRICAL POTENTIAL DIFFERENCE OR ELECTROMOTIVE FORCE
-ŇŠPÇ- MEASURE OF ELECTRIC DISPLACEMENT FIELD/POLARIZATION VECTOR
-LŠPY- MEASURE OF MAGNETIC FLUX DENSITY/B-MAGNETIC FIELD STRENGTH
-LŠPR- MEASURE OF EXPOSURE TO IONIZING RADIATION
-GZKL- MEASURE OF ENERGY PER AMOUNT OF SUBSTANCE
-GZKR- MEASURE OF VOLUME OCCUPIED BY AN AMOUNT OF SUBSTANCE AT A GIVEN TEMPERATURE AND PRESSURE
-KTL- AREA/AREAL FOOTPRINT/PLOT OF GROUND/PLOT OF LAND
-RNZM- CONCAVE DISC (SHAPED LIKE A LIFE-SAVER PIECE OF CANDY)
-RẒBW- CHEMICAL COMPOUND BY TYPE OF MOLECULE BOND

def.gr: Idiopathic Diseases/Disorders, Non-Genetic Congenital Disorders, or Diseases/Disorders of Unknown/Uncertain Etiology
Preliminary Note on Quasi-Taxonomic Roots/Stems Denoting Biological Life-forms
Affixes Used with Taxonomic Stems for Genus or Species or Sub-Species Identification
Affixes for Grouping Biological Life-Form Roots/Stems into Classificatory Schemata/Taxonomies
Arthropods (including Arachnids, Crustaceans, Myriapods, and Insects)

def.deftext: BSC (to be) an occurrence of something; to happen / occur / take place / transpire / to “pass” [both the content/nature of the event and its transpiring
CTE (to be) a state of something occurring/transpiring of an act/event/state
CSV (to be) an act of (causing) something to happen/occur
BSC a state/act of manifesting; be or make real / reify

def.gr: NOTE: for the meaning of the old FORMAL stems previously associated with this root, use the the following new root:

def.deftext: BSC (to be) a step/act/action (to be) taken; to take a step (to do/accomplish something), to act (in order to do/accomplish something), to take an action (to do something)
CTE (to be) a state of a step/act/action occurring/transpiring/being taken
CSV (to be) an act of taking a step or action to cause something to happen/occur
OBJ (to be) the step/act/action one takes to so something
BSC (to be) a phenomenon; for a phenomenon to happen [i.e., an event/occurrence/state so unusual, surprising, unlikely, or consequential as to be significant]
BSC (to be) an incident [i.e., an event/occurrence with significant and (potentially) adverse/undesirable consequences]
BSC (to be) an act of knowing an ontological fact; to know an ontological fact [ = have awareness/understanding of and ability to recall an ontological fact]
CTE (to be) the ability/capacity to know an ontological fact
CSV (to be) the physical/mental process of (an act of) knowing an ontological fact
OBJ (to be) an ontological fact; (to be) the ontological fact one knows
BSC (to be) epistemological/conventionalized fact; know [ = have awareness/understanding and ability to recall] an epistemological/conventionalized fact
BSC (to be) something known via experience/proficiency; know via familiarity or experience]
find out, discover, determine, wisdom, insight, enlightenment, scholar

def.gr: NOTE: for the meaning of the old FORMAL stems previously associated with this root, use the the following new root:
This stem signifies learning from static knowledge sources (e.g., books/documents and/or personal research; for learning from a teacher, see -DDY- ‘TEACHING ⬌ BEING A STUDENT’
def.deftext: BSC (to be) an act of studying/learning knowledge; to study [CPT version = learn]
CTE(to be) the ability/capacity to study [CPT version = learn]
CSV(to be) a physical act/process of studying [CPT version = learning]
OBJ(to be) what one studies or learns about
BSC (to be) an act of practicing; to practice CPT = be proficient at; have proficiency in
BSC (to be) a source of knowledge, a resource from which facts can be learned, a knowledge base

gr.b: ‘VOCATION / CAREER / AREA OF EXPERTISE OR PROFICIENCY’

def.deftext: BSC (to be) a state/process of pursuing a vocation; to pursue a vocation [i.e., a skill or subject matter one is dedicated to learning and practicing] CPT Version = (to be) a state/process of having/practicing a vocation; to have/practice a vocation
CTE(to be) the ability/capacity to ursue/study [CPT version = practice/engage in] one’s vocation
CSV(to be) a state/process of learning/studying/practicing for one’s vocation; to study/learn/practice in furtherance of one’s vocation CPT = to perform or carry out an act as part of one’s vocation
OBJ (to be) (the particular set of skills or subject matter which is) one’s vocation
BSC (to be) a state/process of pursing a career; pursue a career [i.e., one’s chosen set of skills/knowledge/expertise for making one’s living]
BSC (to be) a state/process of learning/studying an area of expertise; to pursue becoming proficient/expert at something CPT = (to be/have) proficiency/expertise in something
BSC (to be) a state/instance of being competent; to be competent (i.e., able to meet expected standards of performance in one’s work/duties)
CTE (to be) the feeling/subjective experience of being competent; to experience the feeling of knowing one is competent
CSV (to be) a physical manifestation of competency; to do something competently or that demonstrates competence
OBJ (to be) what one is competent at

BSC (to be) a state/instance of being qualified for something, meeting qualifications for something; to be qualified at/for something, to meet the qualifications for something [i.e., where the qualifying criteria are skill-, knowledge-, or experience-based]

BSC (to be) a state of/instance of being qualified for something, meeting qualifications for something; to be qualified at/for something, to meet the qualifications for something [i.e., where the qualifying criteria are NOT skill-, knowledge-, or experience-based, but rather are based on an external parameter such as age, height, weight, nationality, one’s religion, one’s location, being in a certain profession, etc.]

BSC (to be) a state/act of testing a party/entity (i.e., subjecting a party/entity to a process by which it/they must prove/demonstrate that it /they meet some standard or expected level of performance/knowledge/skill/talent, etc.)
CTE (to be) a state of being subject to testing
CSV (to be) the physical act/process of testing a party/entity; to test, to give a test/exam
OBJ (to be) the test/exam itself which the party/entity takes or is subjected to

BSC (to be) a vetting/evaluation process (i.e., a process of investigating/evaluating a party/entity to determine that they meet some standard or expected level of performance/skill/background, etc.); to vet, to evaluate

BSC (to be) an experiment/test (i.e., a clinical procedure to determine the validity of a specific hypothesis, to determine the presence/absence of (a) particular substance(s), etc.; to conduct an experiment or clinical test
BSC (to be) a state/act of demonstrating the factuality of something; to demonstrate that something is so
CTE (to be) a state of being subject to demonstration, being demonstrated
CSV (to be) the physical act/process of demonstrating something; to do something that demonstrates something is so
OBJ (to be) that which is (to be) demonstrated
BSC (to be) a state/act of proving, presenting evidence that attempts to prove something; to attempt to prove, to present evidence that attempts to prove something CPT Version = proof; to prove
BSC (to be) a state of establishing/meeting a standard of proof; to establish or meet a standard of proof

BSC (to be) the topic / subject / subject matter / matter at hand; to address/discuss/ deal with a particular topic / subject (i.e., what is at hand, in mind, under consideration, under advisement, at issue, in question, etc.) [CPT = conclude]
CTE (to be) a state of there being a topic/subject/subject matter/theme
CSV (to be) an act/process of addressing or dealing with a particular topic/subject/theme
OBJ (to be) one’s opinion/take/perspective/point of view/contribution on a topic/subject/theme

BSC (to be) the point one wishes/tries to make (e.g., in a discussion, an essay, an article, a speech, a briefing, etc.); to try to make one’s point [i.e., try to get one’s audience to understand or accept one’s opinion or conclusions]. CPT Version = succeed in making one’s point
BSC (to be) a thesis; to present a thesis (i.e., a conclusion about something based on a formal analysis and presentation of evidence) [CPT = conclude]
BSC (to be) an act of realizing something; to realize [ = understand via act of insight/intuition]
CTE (to be) the ability/capacity to realize something
CSV (to be) the physical/mental process of (an act of) realizing something
BSC (to be) an act of understanding/comprehending something; to understand or comprehend something [ = know via a process of personal and/or shared analysis/contemplation/introspection/discussion]

BSC (to be) an act of understanding/comprehending something: understand or comprehend something [ = due to intelligibility/distinctness/clarity/coherence/legibility/lucidity of input/medium/message/material]

def.co: NOTE: This root does not refer to ‘make/create’ meaning ‘emit/secrete/produce’as in ‘make noise’ or ‘make milk’, etc.

def.deftext: BSC (to be) an instance/act of making/constructing/creating something via integration of material resources according to an implicit or explicit plan/instinct/motive/design
CTE (to be) the existential state of creating/making/constructing
CSV (to be) the method/steps employed/manifested in making/creating/constructing something
OBJ (to be) that which is made/created/constructed; the product of an act of making/creating/constructing

BSC (to be) an instance/act of forming or fashioning something via a combination of ingredients, e.g., cooking, mixing together, combining melodies from instruments to make music, tinkering with a variety of parts, etc.
BSC (to be) an instance/act of bringing something into being via organizing disparate parts into a coherent whole
BSC "formal producing/establishing (e.g., book publishing, charity founding)"
BSC pondering/weighing a choice/conduct pro-vs-con analysis
BSC collating (determining the relationship between entities)
BSC retention of something past into the present
BSC trying to solve a puzzle
BSC wondering about something potentially knowable
BSC wondering about something no longer knowable
BSC wondering about something not yet knowable
BSC inspection (verifying compliance to a standard)
BSC stopping on a transport route
BSC location served by commercial sea line/airline
BSC preservation (via chemical or biological means)
BSC oversight/governance to maintain one's responsibility
BSC taking/picking up something to keep it
BSC making something happen by will/demeanor/power
BSC use of physical force against another's will
BSC similarity/resemblance to oneself on another occasion
BSC degree of definition/exactness of distinction
BSC degree of ease/difficulty (physical and mental effort)
BSC degree of ease/difficulty (effort in terms of practicality)
BSC degree of ease/difficulty (being faced with a dilemma)
BSC degree of potential control to hold/restrain
BSC degree of natural virtue/desired behaviour
BSC setting in motion via physical contact
BSC grinding to a granular consistency
BSC cutting something with a blade/force
BSC making a crack/rent in something
BSC separating something from something else
BSC mincing (slicing to the point of becoming paste-like)
BSC eviscerating (removing most of the interior)
BSC leaving behind a concavity via digging
BSC excavation/exhumation (to reshape or find something inside)
BSC dredging (to improve passage or find something inside)
BSC potentially functioning better along with another
BSC entity physically fitting with another as to be carried
BSC finding/establishing a niche for something
BSC being connected via a pivot point
BSC being able to pivot due to juncture
BSC tension caused by pivoting (within juncture)
